
// 
// These statuses marks the party members to be AI controlled.
//




// Using this as base for the other statuses
new entry "AI_CONTROLLED_BASE"
type "StatusData"
data "StatusType" "BOOST"
data "StackId" "AI_CONTROLLED"
data "StackType" "Overwrite"
data "Description" "AI_CONTROLLED_Des;2
data "Icon" "TAC_AIControlled"
data "FormatColor" "Special"
data "StatusPropertyFlags" "ApplyToDead;DisableCombatlog;ForceOverhead;IgnoreResting;OverheadOnTurn"
data "Passives" "AI_CONTROLLED_Passive;AI_SHADOWCURSE_Passive;AI_Stop_Passive"

new entry "AI_CONTROLLED_DEFAULT"
type "StatusData"
data "StatusType" "BOOST"
using "AI_CONTROLLED_BASE"
data "DisplayName" "AI_CONTROLLED_DEFAULT;1"
data "StatusPropertyFlags" "ApplyToDead;DisableCombatlog;IgnoreResting;OverheadOnTurn"

new entry "AI_CONTROLLED_MELEE"
type "StatusData"
data "StatusType" "BOOST"
using "AI_CONTROLLED_BASE"
data "DisplayName" "AI_CONTROLLED_MELEE;1"
data "Boosts" "AiArchetypeOverride(melee_smart, 1)"

new entry "AI_CONTROLLED_CLEAR"
type "StatusData"
data "StatusType" "BOOST"
data "StackId" "AI_CONTROLLED"
data "StackType" "Overwrite"
data "StatusPropertyFlags" "ApplyToDead;DisableCombatlog;DisableOverhead;DisablePortraitIndicator;IgnoreResting"
data "RemoveEvents" "OnStatusRemoved"
data "OnApplyFunctors" "RemoveStatus(BANISHED_FROM_PARTY)"




// 
// BANISHED STATUS: Flag companions to keep them out of the party as NPCs.
//




new entry "BANISHED_FROM_PARTY"
type "StatusData"
data "StatusType" "BOOST"
data "StackId" "BANISHED_AI_RETURN"
data "StackType" "Ignore"
data "DisplayName" "BANISHED_AI_RETURN;1"
data "Description" "BANISHED_AI_RETURN_Des;2
data "Icon" "TadpoleSuperPower_PsionicDominance"
data "FormatColor" "Purple"
data "Boosts" "FactionOverride(Source);SightRangeOverride(100)"
data "StatusPropertyFlags" "ApplyToDead;BringIntoCombat;DisableCombatlog;InitiateCombat"
data "RemoveEvents" "OnCombatEnded;OnTurn"
data "RemoveConditions" "not Combat() and not Dead()"
